verbs.description: BRUSSELS ( AP ) — [ARG0: The EU 's trade chief] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Monday] [ARG1: that the bloc 's two most powerful leaders will tell U.S. President Donald Trump to back off on plans to impose steel and aluminum]
BRUSSELS ( AP ) — The EU 's trade chief said Monday that the bloc 's two most powerful leaders [V: will] tell U.S. President Donald Trump to back off on plans to impose steel and aluminum

BRUSSELS ( AP ) — The EU 's trade chief said Monday that the bloc 's two most powerful leaders will tell [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] to [V: back] off [ARG1: on plans to impose steel and aluminum]
